scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml; pnpm -r exec rm -rf node_modules dist
scripts.build: pnpm run build:packages && pnpm run build:playground
scripts.build:packages: pnpm run clean; pnpm -F './packages/**' run build
scripts.release:alpha: pnpm run build:packages && pnpm publish --tag alpha
scripts.release:beta: pnpm run build:packages && pnpm publish --tag beta
scripts.release:canary: pnpm run build:packages && pnpm publish --tag canary
